Instruction: Warm a heavy skillet, griddle, or cast-iron frying pan over medium-low heat.

Heat a skillet, griddle, or frying pan over medium-low heat. Stir together flour, salt, and baking soda in a bowl. Make a well in the center, add buttermilk, then mix quickly into a dough. Turn out onto a floured surface, gently knead, shape into a 1/2-inch thick round cake, and cut into quarters.
Cook the wedges for 6 to 8 minutes on each side until they turn golden brown.
